Description.Text: The Longlands Inn & Restaurant is a charming 4-star hotel offering elegant accommodation in Carnforth, near the Lake District. It boasts a traditional pub, restaurant and a good location in the Lancashire countryside. Carnforth is a small town conveniently situated on the northeast end of Morecambe Bay. It is an ideal base for reaching the Lake District and other Lancastrian attractions. Nearby places of interest include Lancaster Canal, Morecambe Bay, The Winter Gardens and Lancaster Castle. Carnforth train station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Lake District destinations. The hotel is housed in a traditional cottage-style building with a modern extension. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Lapwing rooms are decorated in a traditional country style. They are located in the newer side of the building and overlook Tewitfield marina. Amenities include a TV, work desk, tea and coffee equipment and en-suite bathroom. The award-winning Lancashire restaurant serves traditional pub classics with a modern twist. Guests can enjoy a range of drinks at the hotel bar. Free parking is possible onsite.
